articles.author: Matt Young
articles.title: Witnesses Describe Horror as Shark Tears Aussie Man Apart During Attack - Yahoo! Voices
articles.description: Jeff Rotman/Getty ImagesAuthorities in Australia postponed the search for the body of a 55-year-old man on Tuesday, believed to have been mauled by a shark...
articles.content: Authorities in Australia postponed the search for the body of a 55-year-old man on Tuesday, believed to have been mauled by a shark in a known great white hotspot. Witnesses described their horror at… [+817 chars]
